description.title: Description
description.description: The description of the this entity

animations.title: Animations
animations.description: Sets the mapping of internal animation references to actual animations. This is a JSON Object of name/animation pairs

identifier.description: Sets the name for this entity's description.
identifier.title: Identifier

is_spawnable.title: Is spawnable
is_spawnable.description: Sets whether or not this entity has a spawn egg in the creative ui.

is_summonable.title: The is summonable property
is_summonable.description: Sets whether or not we can summon this entity using commands such as /summon.

is_experimental.title: Is experimental
is_experimental.description: Sets whether or not this entity is experimental. Experimental entities are only enabled when the experimental toggle is enabled.

runtime_identifier.title: Runtime identifier
runtime_identifier.description: Sets the name for the Vanilla Minecraft identifier this entity will use to build itself from.

scripts.title: Scripts
scripts.description: Sets the mapping of internal animation controller references to actual animation controller. This is a JSON Array of name/animation-controller pairs

animate.title: Animate
animate.description: Tells minecraft to run which animation controllers and under what conditions

oneOf.title: Animation
oneOf.description: The name of an animation controller referenced in animations
